snippet: Philadelphia beat Atlanta after coming off a 21-point loss to lowly Washington that knocked it out of first place in the Atlantic Division and down to No. 7 in the Eastern Conference.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Philadelphia 76ers defeat Atlanta Hawks, 95-90; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Philadelphia beat Atlanta after coming off a 21-point loss to lowly Washington that knocked it out of first place in the Atlantic Division and down to No. 7 in the Eastern Conference.

headline.seo: Elton Brand Helps 76ers Get Back on Track
headline.main: After Dismal Defeat, 76ers Get Back on Track
headline.print_headline: After Dismal Defeat, 76ers Get Back on Track
